strings.Value: "Is it right to turn against an entire faith because of its most misguided adherents? While you lived in Qadira, you must have had friends and loved ones who followed the path of Sarenrae."
"This is true. But it was not Sarenrae's teachings that made my friends kind and just."

"You don't think I'm that stupid, do you? I'm sure we could find kindness among the worshippers of Lamashtu, and abstainers among the followers of Cayden Cailean. But I've seen enough zealous servants of Sarenrae to suspect them of the worst. Call it prudent caution, if you wish."
